All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddHoliday
    Represents the screen when staff wants to add a holiday
    AddMovie  
    AddShowtime
    Represents the screen for staff to add a new showtime.
    AdminMenu
    Represents the screen for staff Menu displaying all his/her options
    AllMoviesList
    Represents the screen that display all movies in all cineplexes
    BaseMenu
    Represents the home page.
    Booking
    Represents a booking containing relevant booking information when customer booked seats for a showtime A booking corresponds to a customer
    BookingController
    Represent a booking controller that assist moviegoer in their booking Gets parameters from views that are visited by moviegoer
    BookingHistory
    Represents the screen for booking history of a customer
    ChooseCineplex
    Represents the screen to choose a cineplex
    ChooseMovie
    Represents the screen to choose a movie
    ChooseSeats
    Represents the screen where user choose seats for booking
    ChooseShowtime
    Represents the screen to choose a showtime
    Cinema
    Represents a cinema in a particular cineplex A cinema corresponds to cineplex id
    Cineplex
    Represents a Cineplex consisting of staff, movies and cinemas(theatre halls)
    Customer
    Represents a customer who is a moviegoer
    DBController
    Represents a controller that helps to read/write data from and to database Assist in instantiating all instances of every classes using data stored in database Assist in saving all instances of every classes into database
    EditBaseTicketPrice
    Represents the screen where staff can edit the base price of tickets of the cineplex staff belongs to
    EmailVerification
    Represents the screen to verify email of a customer
    EnterParticulars
    Represents the screen where a customer enters his/her particulars to complete his/her booking
    Holiday
    Represents the all the holidays registered
    LeaveReview
    Represents the screen to leave a review on a movie
    LoginVerification
    Represents the screen for staff to login and henceforth verify his/her username and password
    MainModel
    Represents the main model that contains all the data
    MOBLIMA  
    Movie
    Represents a Movie belonging to a particular cineplex
    MoviegoerMenu
    Represents the main menu for moviegoer (customer)
    MovieInformation
    Represents the screen that shows all information on a movie
    Navigation
    Static class which controls the stack of views.
    Review
    Represents a review for a particular movie belonging to a particular cineplex.
    ReviewController
    Represents a controller that assist moviegoer when it comes to reviews
    ReviewList
    Represents the screen that shows all reviews of a movie
    SearchMovie
    Represents the screen to search for any movie by title
    Showtime
    The type Showtime.
    Staff
    Represents a staff that belonging to a specific cineplex
    StaffController
    Represents a controller that assist staff as they navigate the views specifically assigned to staff
    Top5Controller
    Represents a controller that assist moviegoer and staff to view the top5 movies by sales or rating.
    Top5Rating
    Represents the screen that shows top 5 movies by rating
    Top5Sales
    Represents the screen that shows top 5 movies by ticket sales
    UpdateMovie  
    View
    Represents the parent class of all the views Abstract class with abstract methods implemented by its subclasses
